trans-unit.source: Creates a quadratic Bezier curve between two points in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 中的兩點之間建立二次方貝茲曲線。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to create composite shapes using <xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment> objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>物件建立複合圖形使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment>物件和其他區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment> class does not contain a property for the starting point of the line.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment>類別不包含屬性，以線條的起點。

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the line is the end point of the previous segment, or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> if no other segments exist.
trans-unit.target: 線條的起點是上一個區段中，端點或<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>如果不存在任何其他區段。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment> objects inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, they provide several special features: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment>物件繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>類別，提供數個特殊功能： 它們可以宣告為多個物件之間共用，變成唯讀，以改善效能、 複製，和為執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features that are provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關各項功能所提供的<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The control point of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 的控制點。

trans-unit.source: The end point of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 的端點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> is to be stroked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要將這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 描邊，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> class with the specified control point, end point, and Boolean indicating whether to stroke this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的控制點、結束點，以及指出是否要將這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 描邊的布林值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定曲線的控制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The control point of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 的控制點。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment.Point1" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment.Point1" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 的結束 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />。

trans-unit.source: The end point of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment" /> 的端點。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment.Point2" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment.Point2" /> 相依性屬性。
